Clip.Title: AERIAL AMERICA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From its Great Lakes to its Grand Canyon, its Rocky Mountain peaks to its Key West reefs, America is a land of amazing destinations. This aerial adventure over the nation's most remarkable landscapes and landmarks captures the breathtaking beauty of America, while demonstrating how its sense of wonder has inspired countless artists, thinkers, and revolutionaries.

Clip.Title: THE LOCKERBIE BOMBING
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Before 9/11, this 1988 bombing was the deadliest attack on American civilians. Reveal untold stories from eyewitness accounts and unique eyewitness footage.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: An aerial survey of world famous Cape Breton Island reveals why this has been called the "world's greatest road trip" - from the Canso Causeway to the Cape Breton Highlands - the island is a world unto its own.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE

Clip.Title: THE LOCKERBIE BOMBING

Clip.Title: ALL ABOARD
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Trekking accross the barren wastelands of the Australian Outback by rail reveals the desert's unique culture.

Clip.Title: MEN IN RED SUITS: THE SECRET HISTORY OF SANTA CLAUS
Clip.Episode: Men in Red Suits: The Secret History of Santa Claus
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Every year men put on red suits, stuff pillows under their belts, and transform themselves into Santa Claus. Who are they personifying? A Christian saint or a pagan deity, a toy salesman, soft-drink spokesman or that mystical being who can fulfill every child's dream?

Clip.Title: MYSTICAL JOURNEY: KUMBH MELA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: West meets East when acclaimed actor Dominic West joins his childhood friend on a pilgrimage to Northern India and the biggest religious festival in the world, Kumbh Mela. Here, 100 million Hindus have gathered to wash away their sins in the holy rivers near Allahabad, on the banks of Sangam. It is also where Dominic's friend Sir James Mallinson will be initiated into a senior role called a mahant. Follow these friends on this incredible two-week journey, and submerge yourself in the sacred waters and culture of this triennial celebration.

Clip.Title: SKY VIEW
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Soar over Europe and experience the landscape from an eagle's perspective. This remarkable series uses the latest HD and camera mount technology to give the audience a view of Europe and its history that will takes their breath away.

Clip.Title: CANADA 1812: FORGED IN FIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Half Cherokee and half Scottish, John Norton leads Six Nations warriors against the invading Americans.

Clip.Title: CANADA 1812: FORGED IN FIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: An east coast shipper creates a private naval fleet to seize American ships.

Clip.Title: SERIOUSLY AMAZING OBJECTS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: America is truly a melting pot, one that's been simmering for centuries, and made up of warriors, innovators, icons, and the objects they left behind. Follow one lucky couple as they're whisked to Montana to witness a re-creation of the Battle of Little Bighorn. Then watch as a friends' trip to the zoo turns into an art project with pandas. Private tours of the secret vaults to see Edison's first bulbs, the first Colt revolver, and other incredible artifacts make for a Smithsonian visit they'll never forget.

Clip.Title: THE KGB DISSIDENT
Clip.EpisodeSummary: This documentary tells the story of KGB officer Viktor Orekhov who monitored, collected evidence and severely punished the dissidents of the USSR.

Clip.Title: ELIZABETH I: KILLER QUEEN
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Did one of the most controversial royal love affairs in history lead to savage murder? New evidence sheds light on the Elizabethan murder mystery that has lain unsolved for 450 years.

Clip.Title: SERIOUSLY AMAZING OBJECTS
